body: Hello! today I got ma first prestige after 8 months lol, when I started I was nooby and now im a decent pvper, id like to thank everyone who have help me get up to first prestige!! <3 Im looking forward for second prestige!
body_tagged: Hello! today I got ma first prestige after 8 months lol, when I started I was nooby and now im a decent pvper, id like to thank everyone who have help me get up to first prestige!! <3 Im looking forward for second prestige!
title: Adventures For First Perstige!

replies.body: Congrats! This might get locked though...
replies.body_tagged: Congrats! This might get locked though...

replies.body:
Hey Wolf!Congrats on your achievement, I'm happy for you!
However, prestige posts aren't allowed, as the thread is usually directed around one person and not the community as a whole.

Therefore, this thread has to locked.
Once again, congrats on your prestige!
